CustomField.description: The full address of the service address for this site
CustomField.formula: StreetLine1__c + ", " + IF( NOT( ISNULL(StreetLine2__c) ) ,StreetLine2__c + BR() , BR()) + City__c + ", " + State__c + ", " + PostalCode__c + BR() + Country__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The full address of the service address for this site
CustomField.label: Full Service Address
